Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about VEX Aware and vulnerability management

General

What is the difference between VEX and traditional vulnerability scanning?

Traditional scanning identifies all known vulnerabilities in your dependencies. VEX adds context about whether those vulnerabilities are actually exploitable in your specific implementation, dramatically reducing false positives.

How long does VEX Aware implementation take?

Most organizations can complete basic implementation in 1-2 weeks. Full integration with CI/CD pipelines typically takes 4-6 weeks depending on complexity.

What is the average ROI for VEX Aware?

Organizations typically see 70-85% reduction in vulnerability investigation time, resulting in significant cost savings. The average ROI is achieved within 3-6 months.

Technical

Does VEX Aware work with my existing tools?

Yes! VEX Aware integrates with popular security scanners, CI/CD platforms, and SBOM tools. We support OpenVEX, CycloneDX, and CSAF formats.

Can I deploy VEX Aware on-premises?

Absolutely. VEX Aware offers both cloud and on-premises deployment options to meet your security and compliance requirements.

What programming languages does VEX Aware support?

VEX Aware is language-agnostic and works with any technology stack. Our API has client libraries for Python, JavaScript, Go, and Java.

Compliance

Is VEX Aware compliant with SOC 2 and ISO 27001?

Yes, VEX Aware is SOC 2 Type II certified and ISO 27001 compliant. We also support HIPAA and PCI DSS requirements.

How does VEX Aware help with security audits?

VEX Aware provides comprehensive audit trails, automated compliance reports, and documented justifications for vulnerability assessments.

Still have questions?

Can't find what you're looking for? Check out our comprehensive documentation or contact our support team.
